kpi.name: M8017C5

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter System Handover preparations to UTRAN due to admission control in target cell per neighbor cell relationship
kpi_info.use: Number of failed Inter System Handover preparations to UTRAN due to admission control of target cell per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: Updated when an S1AP:HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE message is received from MME with cause "No radio resources available in target cell" for an Inter System Handover. This counter is updated for the source cell of the handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter System Handover preparations to UTRAN due to admission control in target cell per neighbor cell relationship
